lead_paragraph: An unusually strong storm in Yancheng, a city of 7.1 million overlooking the Yellow Sea, featured wind gusts exceeding 80 miles an hour by some accounts.

headline.print_headline: Tornado Ravages a Chinese City, Killing at Least 98
headline.main: Tornado Kills at Least 98 in Eastern China

snippet: An unusually strong storm in Yancheng, a city of 7.1 million overlooking the Yellow Sea, featured wind gusts exceeding 80 miles an hour by some accounts.
abstract: Tornado rips through coastal Chinese city of Yancheng, killing 98 people and injuring 800 others.
